member.name: T:Sias.VacuumStation.SVacuumStationDevice
member.summary:
VacuumStation device
The vacuum station device is an \ref AccessibleDevices "accessible device" representing exactly one sias vacuum station module on a sias instrument.
member.details:
\ingroup Dev_VacuumStation
The vacuum station is special as it needs for the usage some lyout conditions not directly assignable with layout properties as those are not part of the layout device component.
The interface includes - configuration properties for ... - layout properties for the vacuum station slots - properties reflecting vacuum station speeds and times - methods for starting and stopping the vacuum station .
%SVacuumStationDevice class diagram
\image html "SVacuumStationDevice.png"

member.name: M:Sias.VacuumStation.SVacuumStationDevice.HandleModuleError(System.Boolean,System.Object[])
member.summary: This method handles the module errors of SVacuumStation devices
member.details: Possible Module types: - 0x0040 (\ref Sias::CanDev::eMODULE_TYPE_CONST "MT_SHAKER") . Handled errors: - none .
member.param: true if force error handling, false if not

member.name: M:Sias.VacuumStation.SVacuumStationDevice.PrepareSetVacuum(System.Int16,System.Int16)
member.summary:
Prepare new target vacuum and treshold setting
Important this needs to get started to get activted.

member.name: M:Sias.VacuumStation.SVacuumStationDevice.PrepareVacuumInContainer(System.Int16)
member.summary:
Prepare vacuum in vacuum container.
This methode prepares a vacuum in vacuum container while the vacuum chamber valve remains closed. Important: The method does not wait until the vacuum container has the defined vacuum.

member.name: M:Sias.VacuumStation.SVacuumStationDevice.SetVacuumInStation(System.Int16,System.Int16)
member.summary:
Set Vacuum to station.
This methode prepares the vacuum in the chamber until the defined Threshold gets reached. Then the chamber valve gets opened. Important: The method does not wait for vacuum.

member.name: F:Sias.VacuumStation.SVacuumStationDevice.ActualLayoutDevice
member.summary: Actual layout device. E.g. for sending the display state to layout

member.name: M:Sias.VacuumStation.SVacuumStationDevice.AttachLayoutData(Sias.Core.Interfaces.ILayoutDevice)
member.summary:
Attach layout data.
This method tries to attach the layout data found at the given layout device to the device. If this will succeed it returns true. If it fails it returns false. In this case the calling method should retry until it finds a fitting layout device.
member.param: The layout device to attach or null to unattach an attached layout device.
member.returns: true if attachable, false if not

member.name: M:Sias.VacuumStation.SVacuumStationDevice.GetAccessMode(System.Object)
member.summary:
Get Access mode.
This Method is used to request the actual access mode.
member.returns: Access mode for the given caller object

member.name: M:Sias.VacuumStation.SVacuumStationDevice.SetAccessMode(System.Object,Sias.Core.Interfaces.SAccessMode,System.Int32)
member.summary:
Set access mode.
This method prepares the vacuum station module to allow the requested access.
member.remarks: Remarks: - If the timeout is longer than the remaining vacuum station time the function will not wait for the finished timeout. It will return inaccessible immediately

member.name: P:Sias.VacuumStation.SVacuumStationDevice.ElutionPlateCarrierSlot
member.summary:
Elution plate carrier slot property
This layout proeprty is used to define the slot for the elution plate carrier. On some vacuum station devices the elution plate carrier is not removable. On those devices this property may remain undefined (null).

member.name: P:Sias.VacuumStation.SVacuumStationDevice.ElutionPlateSlot
member.summary:
Elution plate slot property
This layout property is used to define the elution plate slot. In case an elution plate carrier slot is defined and a valid elution plate carrier is available this property gets ignored.

member.name: P:Sias.VacuumStation.SVacuumStationDevice.ColumnPlateCarrierSlot
member.summary:
Column plate carrier slot property
This layout proeprty is used to define the slot for the column plate carrier. On some vacuum station devices the column plate carrier is not removable. On those devices this property may remain undefined (null).

member.name: P:Sias.VacuumStation.SVacuumStationDevice.ColumnPlateSlot
member.summary:
Column plate slot property
This layout property is used to define the comumn plate slot. In case an comumn plate carrier slot is defined and a valid comumn plate carrier is available this property gets ignored.

member.name: P:Sias.VacuumStation.SVacuumStationDevice.ElutionPlateCarrier
member.summary:
Elution plate carrier property
This read only property reflects the elution plate carrier. If no elution plate carrier is placed in the vacuum station or if no elution plate carrier slot is defined the property returns null.

member.name: P:Sias.VacuumStation.SVacuumStationDevice.ElutionCarrierParkSlot
member.summary:
Elution carrier park slot property
This proeprty may be set to define the Elution plate carrier park slot. As the Elution plate carrier park slot is typically not part of the device this property can't get automatically assigned as layout device property.

member.name: P:Sias.VacuumStation.SVacuumStationDevice.ColumnPlateCarrier
member.summary:
Column plate carrier property
This read only property reflects the column plate carrier. If no column plate carrier is placed on the vacuum station or if no column plate carrier slot is defined the property returns null.

member.name: P:Sias.VacuumStation.SVacuumStationDevice.ColumnPlateCarrierParkSlot
member.summary:
Column plate carrier park slot property
This proeprty may be set to define the column plate carrier park slot. As the column plate carrier park slot is typically not part of the device this property can't get automatically assigned as layout device property.

member.name: P:Sias.VacuumStation.SVacuumStationDevice.TouchPad
member.summary:
Touch pad property
The touch pad may be used to touch a used column plate on it to avoid dropping liquid from a wet column plate. As the touch pad slot is typically not part of the device this property can't get automatically assigned as layout device property.

member.name: P:Sias.VacuumStation.SVacuumStationDevice.TouchHeightOffset
member.summary:
Touch height offset property
This property may be used to define a height correction on touching a used column plate.

member.name: P:Sias.VacuumStation.SVacuumStationDevice.ActualVacuum
member.summary:
Actual vacuum value in container property [mbar]
This property reads the actual vacuum value from CAN Device. In case the vacuum chamber valve is open this is the same pressure as in the vacuum chamber.
member.remarks: \b Important: This property reflects information read CAN device directly. Some devices may be configured not to reflect the actual vacuum value. In this case the value of this property may be incorrect.

member.name: P:Sias.VacuumStation.SVacuumStationDevice.TargetVacuum
member.summary:
actual target vacuum value property [mbar]
This property reads the target vacuum value from CAN Device.
member.remarks: \b Important: This property reflects information read CAN device directly. Some devices may be configured not to reflect the actual vacuum value. In this case the value of this property may be incorrect.

member.name: P:Sias.VacuumStation.SVacuumStationDevice.LastTargetPressure
member.summary:
Last used target vacuum [mbar] property
This property returns the last target pressure defined using this SVacuumStation device instance. Take care when working with different instances, as the value may not be the value on CAN device.

member.name: P:Sias.VacuumStation.SVacuumStationDevice.LastPressureTreshold
member.summary:
Last pressure treshold [mbar] property
The pressure treshold defines the value when the valve between vacuum chamber and vacuum container gets opened.
member.remarks: Take care: In general opening the valve will reduce the (under)pressure. So it is improtant to have enough distance between pressure threshold and target pressure to avoid permanent switching of the valve!

member.name: T:Sias.VacuumStation.SVacuumStationDevice.ErrorCodes
member.summary:
This static class keeps the error code constants of the \ref Sias::VacuumStation::SVacuumStationDevice errors.
Actually there are no vacuum station device errors
